content: chevron temperature blanket pattern introduction this pattern is to create a lap-blanket sized temperature blanket it is an easy pattern that any beginner crocheter can do a temperature blanket is simply a unit of work a row a round a motif or as in this blanket a chevron for each day the color of that day s work is based on a temperature for that day whatever temperature you decide to do make sure it is easy to gather this data i use the wunderground website to get my temperature data there are more complete descriptions of what a temperature blanket is on the internet and youtube my goals for this blanket were 1 a lap blanket size 2 a pastel roy b giv rainbow color pallet 3 to use something other than acrylic yarn 4 to not have large blocks of the same color while at the same time not being too busy the truboo yarn i used addresses goals 1-3 the truboo also helps with goal 4 since it is a 3 weight yarn i can have larger sections of color for each day and not have it be too busy i used 14 colors to break up the large blocks of color dimensions of the final product is approximately 42 by 48 chevron temperature blanket pattern pattern notes this is the pattern i am currently using for my 2023 temperature blanket as such i haven t completed a blanket using this pattern i will be updating the pattern as we move through the year this pattern is very easy to adjust the size of the blanket if you want the blanket wider add more row per each day to make the blanket longer add additional back loop single crochets blsc into the row similarly this project could be done with a heavier yarn to make a larger blanket try out a few gauge blocks with the new yarn and adjust the number of row and the blscs to make the size work out you will have a lot of ends to weave in with this project especially if you use 14 colors like i did it is best to stay on top of them and weave them in as you go or crochet over them while working the first row of the new color like i did the chain 1 at the beginning of the row does not count as a stitch materials and tools lion brand truboo yarn in the following quantities approximately 1200g for the body 100-200g for the border you should be able to substitute any 3 weight yarn as long as you can match the gauge if you do substitute yarn make sure that the yarn you use is easily available and will be in stock for the
